name: BH - D.I.M.E.N.S.I.O.N.S.
description:
BH - D.I.M.E.N.S.I.O.N.S. 

A game that challenges and terrifies you at the same time, escape from the Creature while manipulating the dimensions of inanimate objects.

Made for school purposes, but starting in the world of game development.

Thanks for playing!
